content: when working in a continuous spiral place a marker on the first st and move up each round when changing colors work up to the last pull through of the last st break yarn at each color change and weave in ends finished measurements width 16 length 15 height 5 materials premier® yarns parfait plush 100% polyester 7oz/200g 174 yds/160m c1 2186-04 seal 1 ball c2 2186-12 grapefruit 1 ball c3 2186-24 spearmint 1 ball c4 2186-20 mint 1 ball c5 2186-17 mustard 1 ball premier® yarns anti-pilling everyday® worsted 100% anti- pilling acrylic 3 5oz/100g 180yds/165m c6 100-12 black 1 ball hook us size i-9 5 5 mm and us size e-4 3 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch markers polyester stuffing 15 x 16 piece of cardboard optional skills/techniques used in this pattern chains single and half_double_crochet stitches increasing and decreasing magic_ring seaming with whipstitch working in back loops only and front loops only
